<h3 id="X38047">X(38047) = CENTROID OF TRIANGLE {X(1), X(6), X(8)}</h3>
Barycentrics &nbsp;&nbsp; a^3+2*(b+c)*a^2+(b+c)*(b^2+c^2)  :  :

<br>
<b>X(38047) = X(1)-4*X(3589) = X(6)+2*X(10) = 2*X(6)+X(3416) = X(8)+2*X(1386) = X(8)+5*X(3618) = 4*X(10)-X(3416) = X(40)+2*X(5480) = X(69)-4*X(3844) = X(69)+2*X(4663) = X(69)-7*X(9780) = 2*X(125)+X(32278) = 2*X(141)-5*X(1698) = 2*X(141)+X(3751) = 2*X(182)+X(355) = 2*X(1386)-5*X(3618) = 5*X(1698)+X(3751) = 2*X(3844)+X(4663) = 4*X(3844)-7*X(9780) = 2*X(4663)+7*X(9780) = X(38046)+2*X(38190)</b>

<p>
X(38047) = midpoint of X(i) and X(j) for these {i,j}: {3679, 16475}, {5050, 5790}, {5085, 38144}, {5657, 14853}, {14561, 38116}, {14848, 38066}, {38049, 38191}, {38110, 38165}, {38186, 38190}<br>
X(38047) = reflection of X(i) in X(j) for these (i,j): (5085, 38118), (10516, 10175), (14561, 38167), (16475, 597), (31884, 10164), (38029, 38110), (38035, 14561), (38046, 38186)<br>
X(38047) = {X(i),X(j)}-harmonic conjugate of X(k) for these (i,j,k): (1, 33159, 17279), (6, 10, 3416), (8, 3618, 1386), (8, 26083, 17289), (42, 26061, 32777), (69, 9780, 3844), (894, 4429, 5880), (984, 29633, 4657), (1215, 25453, 3772), (1698, 3751, 141), (1757, 32784, 4643), (1757, 36478, 32784), (3755, 17355, 5695), (3821, 32935, 17276), (3844, 4663, 69), (4972, 26223, 1836), (29631, 32931, 17720), (29667, 32911, 3966), (38087, 38089, 38023), (38089, 38191, 38049), (38116, 38167, 38035), (38192, 38193, 38165)<br>
